text: The 1965 Tour de Hongrie was the 21st edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 6 to 10 July 1965. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by László Mahó. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Csepel SC | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Tipográfia | style="text-align:right;" | + 58" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | BVSC | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 19" |} |} ==References== 1965 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
title: 1965 Tour de Hongrie
